Thank you for downloading from AddOns88.com! We appreciate your support.

How to Find & Install Your Download

  1. Locate your Downloads folder - it is typically found in your My Documents folder on your C: drive.
  2. Find the program software you downloaded and wish to install (i.e. MapsGalaxy). Double click on the icon.
  3. A prompt will appear to start the installation process. Click “Run” application
